overview: One of the most accomplished and most gifted athletes in the ring â€“ Randy Orton is one of the greatest superstars in WWE History.  Now, get a chance to hear from the Viper as he discusses some of his greatest matches against some of his fiercest rivals, with main event encounters against John Cena, Triple H, The Undertaker, Shawn Michaels, Seth Rollins and so many more!
title: Randy Orton: RKO Outta Nowhere
